nodes.text: Star Wars Folded Flyers is an activity book that instructs readers on creating thirty paper starfighters modeled after six ships from the Star Wars saga: the Naboo Starfighter, Millennium Falcon, T-65 X-wing, BLT-B Y-wing, Jedi Starfighter, and Darth Vader's TIE Fighter. It was written by Benjamin Harper and published by Klutz on March 1, 2012.
